thread.title: Kourtney Kardashian Under Fire for Posting a Photo of Her Four-Year-Old Daughter Penelope Wearing a Lip Ring
thread.title_full: Kourtney Kardashian Under Fire for Posting a Photo of Her Four-Year-Old Daughter Penelope Wearing a Lip Ring

title: Kourtney Kardashian Under Fire for Posting a Photo of Her Four-Year-Old Daughter Penelope Wearing a Lip Ring
text:
A post shared by Kourtney Kardashian (@kourtneykardash) on Feb 27, 2017 at 11:04am PST 
“A child shouldn’t have that. Period,” one angry person commented. 
“You got your little daughter a lip ring? And parent of the year goessss to,” wrote another. 
Others berated the 37-year-old adding: “Why don’t you just add a belly button ring too” and “When I was her age I wasn’t even allowed to wear nail polish.” 
While many pointed out that it probably wasn’t real, Kourtney’s parenting skills continued to be questioned. 
Penelope is emulating her famous aunt’s style, since she’s been pictured wearing a similar piece of jewelry recently. A post shared by Kim Kardashian Snapchats (@kimksnapchats) on Jan 24, 2017 at 2:06pm PST 10 Times Kim Kardashian Got Mad on Social Media 
The couple and their three children, Mason, 7, Penelope and Reign, 2 were vacationing when he casually popped the question. 
But a source told Us that while she’s happy to co-parent with him, “Kourtney is over being with him.”
